title: On Nearly Optimal Paper Moebius Bands
abstract:
Let $\epsilon<1/384$ and let
  $\Omega$ be a smooth embedded paper Moebius
  band of aspect
  ratio less than $\sqrt 3 + \epsilon$. We prove that
  $\Omega$ is within Hausdorff distance
  $18 \sqrt \epsilon$ of an equilateral triangle of
  perimeter $2 \sqrt 3$. This
  is an effective and fairly sharp version of our recent theorems in [{\bf
S0\/}] about
  the optimal paper Moebius band.
